alert.note: Alert for Central Douglas County; Eastern Curry County and Josephine County; Eastern Douglas County Foothills; Jackson County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 26 at 2:28PM PST until December 27 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Periods of heavy snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches, with 6 to 8 inches in the Illinois Valley, Camas Mountain and the higher passes along I- 5. The Cascade Foothills will have 8 to 12 inches. * WHERE...Jackson County, including Medford, Ashland, Gold Hill, Rogue River, Jacksonville and Applegate. All of Eastern Douglas County Foothills, including Steamboat and Toketee Falls. Central Douglas County and Eastern Curry County and Josephine County, including Roseburg, Grants Pass, Cave junction, Camas Valley, Elkton, and Drain. Significant impacts are expected for all area roads and highways. * WHEN...Until 7 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact holiday travel and the morning commute. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: * Travel is strongly discouraged because of dangerous conditions. * If you must travel, keep tire chains, a flashlight, blankets, food, water, medications, and a fully charged phone with you. * The safest place during a winter storm is indoors. * A Winter Storm Warning means that severe winter weather is likely and poses a threat to life and property. Take protective action now. * See https://www.tripcheck.com latest road conditions.

area.areaDesc: Central Douglas County; Eastern Curry County and Josephine County; Eastern Douglas County Foothills; Jackson County
